Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 201(a)(3) of Anacostia Waterfront Corporation Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-586, November 1, 2004, 51 DCR 10681).

Legislative History of Laws

For D.C. Law 15-219, see notes following § 2-1219.19.

For Law 17-138, see notes following § 2-1219.01.

DC CODE § 2-1219.34a

Current through December 11, 2012
